content:
I noticed that in https://www.hl7.org/fhir//searchparameter-registry.html#common
There were two "Patient" entries in the Common Parameters section -- one entry for most resources, and another entry for the MedicationRequest.subject | MedicationAdministration.subject | MedicationStatement.subject | MedicationDispense.subject
In R4 and build.fhir.org, those Medication-related ones have been dropped and not merged into the main "Patient" entry. Was there any reason for this?
@Ken Sinn I'm not sure why they are not in the searchparameter registry. They still exist in the resource itself. @Grahame Grieve any ideas?
@Grahame Grieve Any chance to have a look at this discrepancy?
the source claims that they were moved because of task GF#16547 but in fact they were only removed, not moved
I presume this was an editorial error, since something else moved under the same task was actually moved.
any additional review you can do in the next 2 weeks of the common search parameters would be welcome

The common search parameter "prescription" seems to have been dropped from STU3 -> R4 as a common parameter, though the parameters MedicationAdministration.prescription | MedicationDispense.authorizingPrescription still both exist under MedicationAdministration and MedicationDispense individually - that's all I found.
